item.title: Is there a specific way to make a timer?
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

is there a specific way to make a timer? or just add the int timername = 0;
because i have this

public int Ironwaittimer = 20;

and my timer doesnt work, but when it was set to

public int Ironwaittimer = 0;

it worked, but teled me there immediately, i think this is because the codes think its just a thing to refer to, not a timer to count down

Read full topic
